org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.invoke
Class AeInvoker

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.invoke.AeInvoker
public class AeInvoker
extends java.lang.Object

AeInvoker is responsible for invoking by delegating to a invoke handler and handling the response message or fault from the handler by queuing it back into the engine.

Field Summary
private  IAeInvokeInternal mInvoke
          The invoke data.
private  IAeInvokeHandler mInvokeHandler
          The invoke handler.
private  java.lang.String mQueryData
          Any query data.
private  AeQueuingReplyReceiver mQueuingReplyReceiver
          Reply receiver used to queue result back into the engine.

prepareInvoke

public boolean prepareInvoke()
Delegates to the IAeTwoPhaseInvokeHandler prepare method.

Returns:
true if successful.

handleInvoke

public void handleInvoke()
Delegates a call to the invoke handler to really handle the invoke. The result from the handler is queued back into the engine.
